title: Drawing, "Loggia del Papa o dei Nobile (Loggia of the Pope or the Nobility), Siena, Italy", October 10, 1890
medium: Graphite, brush and watercolor on paper
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right: Whitney Warren fecit
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, Echelle 0.01 = M 1.00; Loggia dei Nobile / Sienna / Oct 10, 1890
description: The elevation is shown at left; upper right, the plan, showing in the left half the floor and the right half the ceiling.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Loggia del Papa o dei Nobile (Loggia of the Pope or the Nobility), Siena, Italy", October 10, 1890.
October 10, 1890. Graphite, brush and watercolor on paper. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-17.
